snippet: The Obama campaign came out swinging, including stronger rhetoric, a new television ad and a conference call questioning Mr. Romney’s truthfulness.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and PETER BAKER

lead_paragraph: The Obama campaign came out swinging, including stronger rhetoric, a new television ad and a conference call questioning Mr. Romney’s truthfulness.

headline.seo: Obama Team Tries to Change Course After Debate Disappoints
headline.main: After Debate, Obama Team Tries to Regain Its Footing
headline.print_headline: Obama Team Tries to Change Course After Debate Disappoints
